natspec.author: metapriest, adrian.wachel, marek.babiarz, radoslaw.gorecki
natspec.details: The contract cannot introspect into the contents of the merkle tree, except when provided a merkle proof,therefore the total liabilities of the merkle tree are untrusted and tree balances must be managed separately

addMerkleTree(bytes32,bytes32,address,ui.details: Anyone may call this function, therefore we must make sure trees cannot affect each other
addMerkleTree(bytes32,bytes32,address,ui.notice: Add a new merkle tree to the contract, creating a new merkle-drop

params.ipfsHash: the ipfs hash of the entire dataset, used for redundance so that creator can ensure merkleproof are always computable
params.newRoot: root hash of merkle tree representing liabilities == (destination, value) pairs
params.tokenAddress: the address of the token contract that is being distributed
params.tokenBalance: the amount of tokens user wishes to use to fund the airdrop, note trees can be under/overfunded

depositTokens(uint256,uint256).details: Anyone may call this function, the only risk here is that the token contract is malicious, rendering the tree malicious
depositTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Add funds to an existing merkle-drop

params.treeIndex: index into array-like map of merkleTrees
params.value: the amount of tokens user wishes to use to fund the airdrop, note trees can be under/overfunded

withdraw(uint256,address,uint256,bytes32.details: Anyone may call this function for anyone else, funds go to destination regardless, it's just a question ofwho provides the proof and pays the gas, msg.sender is not used in this function
withdraw(uint256,address,uint256,bytes32.notice: Claim funds as a recipient in the merkle-drop

params.proof: array of hashes bridging from leaf (hash of destination | value) to merkle root
params.treeIndex: index into array-like map of merkleTrees, which tree should we apply the proof to?
params.value: amount of tokens that will be sent to destination

natspec.notice: This contract is permissionless and public facing. Any fees must be included in the data of the merkle tree.
natspec.title: A factory pattern for merkledrops, that is, airdrops using merkleproofs to compute eligibility
